backend/main.mo: Defines data types and storage maps for quizzes, games, puzzles, sounds, and coloring templates, including localization utilities and converters.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature request for creating a full Spanish translation pack and lists related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing routing, age selection, global providers, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationModal: Displays a celebration modal with confetti, messages, and action buttons after completing quizzes or games.
frontend/src/components/coloring/Colorin: Canvas-based coloring tool with brush, zoom, undo, clear, and touch gesture support, loading either backend or fallback template images.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a decorative footer with animated star and sparkle icons.
frontend/src/components/games/LogicPuzzl: Generates and runs logic puzzles by age group, tracking score, puzzle types, localization, and level progression.
frontend/src/components/games/MathPuzzle: Creates age-appropriate math problems with multiple-choice options, scoring, and progression tracking.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryCard: Memory matching game using emoji themes, managing card states, scoring, and completion flow.
frontend/src/components/games/ProblemSol: Presents scenario-based problem‑solving questions by age group with localized text, scoring, and category selection.
frontend/src/components/games/QuickReact: Implements a timed tap-reaction game that generates random emoji targets per round and tracks score across age‑adjusted difficulty settings.
frontend/src/components/games/ShapeMatch: Provides a memory-style shape‑matching game with age‑based shape sets, tracking selections, matches, and completion.
frontend/src/components/games/SortingCla: Renders a sorting game where items must be placed into age‑appropriate categories, updating progress as items are sorted.
frontend/src/components/games/VisualReco: Creates a spot‑the‑difference game with random difference locations and multiple scene types, completing when all differences are found.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, language selector, and optional home navigation button.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown allowing users to switch among ten supported UI languages.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Supplies a global language context with persistence and mapping to backend language codes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, identity storage, and related context access.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks for fetching games, quiz questions, encouragement messages, and other game types, mapping frontend age groups to backend formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomizedQuizQues: Defines a React Query hook that fetches randomized quiz questions from the backend based on age group, language, and requested count.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and defines a colorful children‑friendly theme along with custom animations.
frontend/src/lib/coloringFallbackTemplat: Contains structured fallback coloring template metadata for each age group, ensuring strict outline‑only rules for offline use.
frontend/src/lib/dailySurprise.ts: Implements deterministic daily game selection per age group using localStorage and a seeded random method.
frontend/src/lib/fallbackQuizQuestions.t: Stores multilingual static fallback quiz questions organized by age group for use when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Empty placeholder file for image caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/quizQuestionSelection.t: Provides utilities for shuffling, selecting quiz subsets, and managing repeat‑reduction via localStorage‑tracked quiz history.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Defines supported language codes and a large dictionary of common UI translation strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringZone.tsx: Displays a coloring template gallery with backend or fallback templates and renders a coloring canvas when a template is selected.
frontend/src/pages/GameZone.tsx: Loads available games for the selected age group and renders the chosen game with completion celebration handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the welcome screen, mascot, and age selection, then allows navigation to games, quizzes, or coloring.
frontend/src/pages/QuizZone.tsx: Runs a quiz session using backend or fallback questions with progress, scoring, and celebration flow.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for building a full Spanish UI translation pack, including existing features, new requests, issues, and architectural notes about the i18n system.
